description: Tenders for the project indicated above, will be accepted by CPC Connect Service or at the following address, up to the tender closing date and time indicated below.
tags: Services de collecte et d'enlèvement des ordures
full_summary:
### Refuse Removal Services
#### Tender Information
**Title (English/French)**: Refuse Removal Services/Services de collecte et d’enlèvement des ordures
**Reference Number (English/French)**: cb-395-11303156
**Solicitation Number (English/French)**: 01B46-2024-008
**Publication Date**: March 6, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: April 10, 2024, 14:00:00
**Amendment Date**: April 10, 2024
**Expected Contract Start Date (English/French)**: July 1, 2024/1er juillet 2024
**Expected Contract End Date (English/French)**: June 30, 2025/30 juin 2025

#### Description
Appointment to provide refuse removal services at multiple sites across PEI as specified in the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) tender document.

#### Contact Information
- **Contact Name (English/French)**: Marie-Pier Parent
- **Contact E-mail (English/French)**: marie-pier.parent@agr.gc.ca
- **Telephone (English/French)**: (506) 531-7263
- **Mailing Address (English/French)**: 2001 Robert-Bourassa Boulevard, Montreal, QC H3A 3N2. 

#### Requirements
- Tender submissions should be received through the Canadabuy service provider's platform by April 10, 2024, 14:00:00.
- A mandatory site visit will be held at Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) Charlottetown, PEI, on Tuesday, March 19, 2024. Provision for the visit should be stated to Kenny MacInnis (kenneth.macinnis@agr.gc.ca) by March 18, 2024.

#### Evaluation Criteria
- The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted.

#### Status
- The tender has expired.
 
#### Attachment
For the complete PWGSC tender document, click [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33659/invitation-to-tender---01b46-24-008-refuse-removal.pdf)


As an expert technical writer, please proofread my rewritten entry and check for grammar, clarity, and consistency.
